## Checklist

<!-- Please check all items that apply before submitting your PR -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My code generates no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have checked for potential security vulnerabilities

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have added/updated integration tests if applicable
- [ ] I have manually tested the changes in a development environment

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if necessary
- [ ] I have added/updated inline documentation for new functions/classes
- [ ] I have documented any breaking changes in the changelog

### Dependencies

- [ ] My changes do not introduce new dependencies
- [ ] I have updated package.json and lock files if dependencies changed
- [ ] Any new dependencies are necessary and well-maintained

## Reviewer Checklist

<!-- For reviewers only - please check these items before approving -->

- [ ] Code changes are well-tested
- [ ] Documentation is updated

- [ ] Performance impact is acceptable
- [ ] Changes align with project goals
